에픽 마법 아이템 2

EPIC MAGIC ITEMS 2

두루마리

SCROLLS

To generate an 에픽 scroll randomly, first roll on 표: 두루마리 유형 to determine whether the 주문 are arcane or 신성. An 에픽 scroll contains 1d8 주문. For each spell, roll on 표: 에픽 두루마리 주문 레벨 to determine its 레벨 and then on the appropriate section of 표: 실제 주문 레벨 to determine the spell’s actual 레벨 and total 메타마법 레벨 보정. To determine the specific 메타마법 레벨 보정, roll on the appropriate section of 표: 주문에 따른 메타마법 레벨 보정. To determine the spell, use the appropriate sections of the nonepic scroll tables.

마법지팡이

STAFFS

마법지팡이 have 50 돌격 when created, and they can’t be recharged.

마법지팡이 use the wielder’s ability score and relevant 특기 to set the DC for 내성 굴림 against their 주문 in such cases where those values would be higher than the listed values for the 마법지팡이.

에픽 마법지팡이 설명

Epic Staff Descriptions

Standard 에픽 마법지팡이 are described below.

Cosmos:  This staff allows use of the following 주문.

• 사슬 번개 (intensified, 1 돌격, DC 29)

• 유성우 (intensified, 1 돌격, DC 34)

• 태양폭발 (intensified, 1 돌격, DC 32)

시전자 레벨: 27th; 전제조건: 마법지팡이 제작, 에픽 마법지팡이 제작, 주문 심화, 사슬 번개, 유성우, 태양폭발; 시장 가격: 683,437 gp.

Domination: This staff allows use of the following heightened 주문.

• 몬스터 지배 (1 돌격, DC 33)

• 요구 (1 돌격, DC 32)

• 광역 몬스터 매혹 (1 돌격, DC 32)

• Geas (heightened, 1 돌격, DC 33)

시전자 레벨: 21st; 전제조건: 마법지팡이 제작, 에픽 마법지팡이 제작, 주문 레벨 강화, 요구, 몬스터 지배, geas, 광역 몬스터 매혹; 시장 가격: 464,400 gp.

Fiery Power: This +5 flaming quarterstaff grants its wielder fire 저항 30 whenever held. In addition, it has the following powers.

• 불의 장벽 (extended, 1 돌격, DC 18)

• 지연 폭발 화염구 (intensified to 240 points of 피해, 2 돌격, DC 22)

• Meteor swarm(heightened to 12th, 2 돌격, DC 30)

• 몬스터 Ix 소환 (extended, 2 돌격, elder 불의 정령 only) A staff of fiery power can be broken in a retributive strike. The breaking of the staff must be purposeful and declared by the wielder. All 돌격 currently in the staff are instantly released in a 30-foot- radius globe. All within 10 feet of the broken staff take points of 피해 equal to eight times the number of 돌격 in the staff, those between 11 feet and 20 feet away take six times the number of 돌격 in 피해, and those 21 feet to 30 feet distant take four times the number of 돌격 in 피해. Successful Reflex 내성 굴림 (DC 17) reduce the 피해 sustained by half. The character breaking the staff has a 50% chance of traveling to another plane of existence; if he or she does not, the explosive release of spell energy destroys him or her. After all 돌격 are used up from the staff, it remains a +5 quarterstaff with no 특수 능력. (Once empty of 돌격, it cannot be broken in a retributive strike.)

시전자 레벨: 25th; 전제조건: 마법지팡이 제작, 에픽 마법지팡이 제작, 주문 시간 연장, 주문 레벨 강화, 향상된 주문 레벨 강화, 주문 심화, 주문 집중 (환기), 지속적인 불꽃, 지연 폭발 화염구, 유성우, 에너지 방어 마법, 몬스터 Ix 소환, 불의 장벽; 시장 가격: 500,000 gp.

The 교황: This staff allows use of the following 주문.

• 스멀거리는 파멸 (enlarged, extended, 1 돌격, DC 23)

• 식물 명령 (enlarged, extended, 1 돌격, DC 25)

• 정령 떼 (intensified, 2 돌격, DC 34)

• 휘청거리는 자 (intensified, 2 돌격, DC 34)

아이템과 캐릭터 간의 갈등

ITEMS AGAINST CHARACTERS

When an item has an Ego of its own, it has a will of its own. The item is, of course, absolutely true to its 성향. If the character who possesses the item is not true to that 성향’s goals or the item’s special 목적, personality conflict—item against character—results. Similarly, any item with an Ego score of 20 or higher always considers itself superior to any character, and a personality conflict results if the possessor does not always agree with the item. When a personality conflict occurs, the possessor must make a Will 내성 굴림 (DC = item’s Ego). If the possessor succeeds, he or she is dominant. If he or she fails, the item is dominant. Dominance lasts for one day or until a critical situation occurs (such as a major battle, a serious threat to either item or character, and so on). Should an item gain dominance, it resists the character’s desires and 요구 concessions such as any of the following:

• Removal of associates or items whose 성향 or personality is distasteful to the item.

• The character divesting him or herself of all other 마법 아이템 or items of a certain type.

• Obedience from the character so the item can direct where they go for its own 목적.

• Immediate seeking out and slaying of creatures hateful to the item.

• Magical protections and devices to protect the item from molestation when it is not in use.

• That the character carry the item with him or her on all occasions.

• That the character relinquish the item in favor of a more suitable possessor due to 성향 differences or conduct.

In extreme circumstances, the item can resort to even harsher measures.

• Force its possessor into 전투.

• Refuse to strike opponents.

• Strike at its wielder or his or her associates.

• Force its possessor to surrender to an opponent.

• Cause itself to drop from the character’s grasp.

Naturally, such actions are unlikely when harmony reigns between the character’s and item’s 성향 or when their 목적 and personalities are well matched. Even so, an item might 소원 to have a 하급 character possess it in order to easily 명령 him or her, or a higher-레벨 possessor so as to better accomplish its goals. All 마법 아이템 with personalities desire to play an important role in whatever activity is under way, particularly 전투. Such items are rivals of each other, even if they are of the same 성향. No intelligent item wants to share its wielder with others. An intelligent item is aware of the presence of any other intelligent item within 60 feet, and most 지능있는 아이템 try their best to 오도 or 주의산만 their host so that he or she ignores or destroys the rival. Of course, 성향 might change this sort of behavior.

Items with personalities are never totally controlled or silenced by the characters who possess them, even though they may never successfully control their possessor. They may be powerless to force their 요구 but remain undaunted and continue to air their 소원 and 요구.
